name: DREAMER Platform game (good tutorial gms 1.4)
description:
This tutorial is very good for beginners because it includes:

  • -Gamepad and Keyboard.
  • -Save and Load.
  • -TextBox with 2 Colors.
  • -Menu Main with Nice Effect.
  • -FullScreen and Windowed Mode.
  • -Physics Player.
  • -Multi Levels.
  • -Coins System.
  • More.....

Engoy it.
